anchorRight.long: Place your main tank on the safer side to protect your backline and stabilize early fights.

pressureLeft.long: The left frontline often takes early pressure. Use durable tanks or control heroes here.

collapseMelee.long: Multiple melee heroes group enemies together and dominate clustered fights.

engineCore.long: Energy gain and cooldown boosts allow faster ultimate rotations and stronger mid-fight bursts.

tempoDoubleCarry.long: Energy acceleration enables frequent ultimate bursts, allowing your carries to snowball fights before enemies can respond.

controlChain.long: Chain crowd control effects to prevent enemies from using key abilities and secure kills early.

frontlineSustain.long: A stable frontline with sustain outlasts enemy burst and slowly overwhelms opponents in extended battles.

burstWindow.long: Wait for the right moment, unleash ultimates together, and eliminate priority targets instantly.

collapsePressure.long: Collapse onto grouped enemies and overwhelm them with stacked AoE damage and control.

balancedScaling.long: Maintain steady pressure early and convert mid-game power spikes into controlled victories.

controlCollapse.long: Control enemies in tight spaces and follow up with concentrated burst damage.

burstWindows.long: Play around synchronized ultimate cycles to repeatedly eliminate high-value targets.

noFrontline.long: Without a true tank, early focus fire can quickly break your formation.

singleFrontlinePvp.long: A single frontline hero is vulnerable to coordinated dive and burst compositions.

tempoNoConversion.long: Fast ultimate cycles are wasted if you lack the damage to secure kills.

lowSustain.long: If your first burst fails, extended fights may turn against you.

delayedNoAnchor.long: Delayed engage heroes require a stable frontline. Without one, they may fall before contributing.

ccVulnerable.long: Heavy crowd control can prevent your carries from casting key abilities.

generic.long: Avoid giving enemies a clean engage and protect your backline during ultimate rotations.

delayedDiveNoAnchor.long: Dive heroes without frontline support can be eliminated before their engage lands.

strong.slowScaling: Excels against teams that rely on late power spikes.
strong.lowCleanse: Dominates teams without cleanse or immunity tools.
strong.poke: Shrugs off poke damage and wins sustained exchanges.
strong.dive: Stable frontline punishes reckless dive attempts.
strong.pokeAttrition: Outlasts poke-heavy teams and wins extended fights.
strong.diveAssassins: Frontline durability counters assassin dive pressure.

weak.heavyCC: Can be locked down before casting ultimates.
weak.stall: Tank-heavy teams delay your win condition.
weak.assassinFocus: Backline carries are vulnerable to assassin focus.
weak.earlyPressure: Strong early aggression can destabilize your setup.
weak.heavyCCLock: Heavy lockdown can interrupt your ultimate rotations.
weak.tankStall: High-durability teams drag fights beyond your burst window.
weak.burstAssassinsOnCarries: Assassin burst threatens exposed damage dealers.
weak.earlyPressureLaneFocus: Early focus can break your frontline before scaling.
weak.coordinatedDiveBurst: Coordinated dive and burst can overwhelm your formation.
